# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(SAMI_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(SAMI)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
SAMIPluginInfo.C
SAMICommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
SAMIPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
SAMIMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtSAMIFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
SAMIEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtSAMIFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${SILO_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${SILO_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(ISAMIDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ISAMIDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ISAMIDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MSAMIDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MSAMIDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${SILO_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MSAMIDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MSAMIDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ESAMIDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ESAMIDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${SILO_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ESAMIDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ESAMIDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ESAMIDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ESAMIDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${SILO_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ESAMIDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ESAMIDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases SAMI ${INSTALLTARGETS})
